node.title: Novak Djokovic brands Peng Shuai disappearance 'shocking'
node.alt: Novak Djokovic raises his arm above his head with his thumb raised
node.description: Novak Djokovic brands Peng Shuai disappearance as "shocking", while the ATP joins the WTA in calling for an investigation.
node.content:
["Novak Djokovic has\u00a0described it as \"shocking\"\u00a0that Women's Tennis Association\u00a0Chinese player Peng Shuai has not been seen since posting allegations of sexual assault on social media against a former senior Chinese official.", "The governing body of men's tennis, the ATP,\u00a0also backed the WTA's call for China to investigate allegations of sexual assault made by Peng on Monday.", "On Sunday, the\u00a0WTA had called on China to investigate Ms Peng's claims, while also demanding an end to censorship of the former top-ranked doubles player.\u00a0", "Ms Peng, one of China's biggest sporting stars, alleged on her Weibo social media account on November\u00a02 that Zhang Gaoli \u2014\u00a0who used to be a member of the Politburo Standing Committee, China's top decision-making body \u2014\u00a0coerced her into sex and they later had an on-off consensual relationship.", "In the post\u00a0\u2014\u00a0which was deleted about half an hour after it was published \u2014\u00a0Ms Peng, 35, said that she could provide no evidence to back her allegations.", "", "
Peng\u00a0Shuai has not been seen since she made allegations of sexual assualt.(Reuters)
", "The internet in China is heavily censored and the private lives of top leaders are an especially sensitive subject.", "Zhang, now 75, was a vice-premier between 2013 and 2018 and served on the Politburo Standing Committee between 2012 and 2017.", "Concerns among the global tennis community have grown as Ms Peng, the first Chinese player to top the world rankings when she was doubles number one in 2014, has not been seen since the post.", "Men's world number one, Novak Djokovic, said he was shocked by the incident.\u00a0", "\"I did hear about it a week ago. Honestly, it's shocking that she's missing, more so that it's someone that I have seen on the tour in the previous years quite a few times,\" the Serb said after his win over Casper Ruud at the ATP Finals on Monday.\u00a0", "In a statement on Sunday, WTA chairman and chief executive Steve Simon said that the recent events were of deep concern.\u00a0", "\"Peng Shuai, and all women, deserve to be heard, not censored. Her accusation about the conduct of a former Chinese leader involving a sexual assault must be treated with the utmost seriousness,\" he said.\u00a0", "China's State Council Information office and the Chinese Tennis Association did not immediately respond to requests for comment on the WTA's statement.", "The International Tennis Federation also did not immediately respond to requests for comment.", "Mr Simon told the New York Times on Sunday that no one involved in\u00a0the tour had\u00a0talked directly to Ms Peng but that he had received assurances from the Chinese Tennis Association that she was safe \"and not under any physical threat\".", "Reuters"]
